scripts.title: The Dragon's Covenant
scripts.synopsis: A young mage discovers an ancient pact between humans and dragons that could save—or destroy—the realm. With war looming, they must navigate treacherous politics and forbidden magic.

scripts.title: Stellar Exodus
scripts.synopsis: The last generation ship carries humanity's remnants across the void. When the AI begins making impossible demands, the crew must choose between obedience and extinction.

scripts.title: Coffee Shop Confessions
scripts.synopsis: Two strangers share a table at a crowded café. Over countless cups of coffee, they unravel each other's secrets, fears, and unexpected connections.

scripts.title: Shadows of the Hive Fleet
scripts.synopsis: A stranded squad of Ultramarines faces the endless hunger of Hive Fleet Leviathan. Their only hope lies in reaching a forgotten beacon before they're consumed.

scripts.title: The Witch's Garden
scripts.synopsis: In a village where nothing grows, a mysterious woman arrives with seeds that bloom in moonlight. But every flower she plants demands a price in memories.

scripts.title: Neural Divide
scripts.synopsis: In a world where memories can be bought and sold, a black-market memory dealer stumbles upon footage that could bring down the megacorp controlling everything.

scripts.title: The Last Bookstore
scripts.synopsis: When her grandmother passes, Maya inherits a failing bookstore and discovers journals revealing decades of secrets hidden between the shelves.

scripts.title: Crusade of Iron
scripts.synopsis: A Black Templar chaplain questions his faith when a miracle on a dying world reveals truths about the Emperor that could shake the Imperium.

scripts.title: Echoes of Eldoria
scripts.synopsis: An elven archaeologist uncovers a city that shouldn't exist—one that fell before her people were even born. Its awakening threatens to rewrite history.
